text: Motion
Photographer
Mei-chan, can you tilt your chin back a bit more?

......
Is this okay?

Yeah, that's it! Looking good, looking good! Fuyu-chan,
the expression you had earlier was better, can you go back?
Sure!

Nice, nice! Cute! Asahi-chan,
can still have your arm out after all? Sorry!
Sure thing.

Alright! Perfect!
This is what "Straylight" is all about! Good job!
Thank you♡ / Thank you

What does it mean
to be "Straylight"?

Huh? Um, well...
It's like, everyone's individuality shines through...
...What's up?

Sorry! Asahi-chan, we need to move soon.
The next job is coming up soon, so...

Huh?
Really?
Yeah, we can't be late, okay?

Thank you for taking such wonderful photos♡
Good job.
Thank you.

No, thank you...!
Let's work together again sometime, okay...?
Motion

...It's hard to put into words what it
means to be "Straylight"...
I thought we captured it.
The true Straylight... the true girls...
